TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsSignatureDefinition extends System.Object

summary.span: のデジタル署名を表します。

span.span: Represents an digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 署名の定義の詳細については[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 の章で、XPS XML Paper Specification () からダウンロードを参照してください[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)です。For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). についてデジタル署名は、記事を参照して、MSDN デジタル署名のフレームワークで使用可能な Open Packaging Conventions の[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)です。For information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). について[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]、XPS XML Paper Specification () からダウンロードを参照してください[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)です。For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 次の例を作成しのプロパティを設定する方法を示しています、です。The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an . summary.span: クラスにまだ書き込まれていないプロパティ変更が存在するかどうかを示す値を取得または設定します。存在する場合はそれらをパッケージのストリームに書き込む必要があります。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unwritten property changes exist for the class and must be written to the package's stream.

value.span: コミットされていない変更が存在する場合は 。それ以外の場合は 。

span.span: if uncommitted changes exist; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Intent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 署名者が署名する署名の目的の同意の文字列値を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.

value.span: 目的の同意を表す (例 : "～に同意します")。

span.span: A that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`Intent`で署名の定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RequestedSigner { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: パッケージへの署名を要求されている人物 (またはパッケージに署名した人物) の ID を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.

value.span: Aを表す署名者、たとえば、"Mary Jones、マーケティング部署"

span.span: A that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティに対応、`SignerName`の属性、`SignatureDefinition`内の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージです。This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package. 名前の違いに注意してください。Notice the difference in the names. 詳細については、`SignerName`属性の 10 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンス ダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

public: property Nullable<DateTime> SignBy { Nullable<DateTime> get(); void set(Nullable<DateTime> value); };

summary.span: 署名を要求されている署名者が指定されたドキュメントの部分に署名する必要がある期限の日時を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.

value.span: 署名者がパッケージに署名する必要がある期限を表す () 。

span.span: A () that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`SignBy`で署名の定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]、パッケージを参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SigningLocale { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: パッケージへの署名が行われる法域を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.

value.span: 法域を表す (例 : "State of Utah, United States")。

span.span: A that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティに対応、`SigningLocation`で署名の定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージです。This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages. 名前の違いに注意してください。Notice the difference in the names. 元のプロデューサー、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージは、このプロパティを設定できます。The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property. 必要に応じて、署名者は、他のユーザーが既に署名されている場合、パッケージの署名時に、プロパティを設定できます。Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed. 詳細については、`SigningLocation`要素を参照してください章 10 で、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property SpotId As Nullable(Of Guid)
public: property Nullable<Guid> SpotId { Nullable<Guid> get(); void set(Nullable<Guid> value); };

summary.span: この の一意の識別子を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this .

value.span: A ()シグネチャ定義の ID を表すです。

span.span: A () that represents the ID of the signature definition.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks リンクする、`Signature`要素をこの、設定する必要があります、`Id`の属性、`Signature`の値に、プロパティです。To link a `Signature` element to this , you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the property. 詳細については`Signature`要素を参照してください、 [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)スキーマです。For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema. 詳細については、`SpotID`の属性、`SignatureDefinition`内の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::SpotLocation ^ SpotLocation { System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::SpotLocation ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::SpotLocation ^ value); };

summary.span: 表示されるデジタル署名を [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] ドキュメント内のどこに表示するかを指定する場所を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.

value.span: 署名の要求を表示するパッケージ内の場所を表す 。

span.span: A that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`SpotLocation`で署名の定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
